channel.title: Projects on Ron Kitainik: Blog & Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ron Kitainik: Blog & Portfolio

item.title: Origami
item.description: When I’m not learning or exercising I am doing origami. Here are some of my best models. Above is a Tree Frog by Satoshi Kamiya Harpy Eagle by Jang Yong Ik

item.title: Simulated Line Following Robot
item.description: A virtual robot that detects targets and bypasses obstacles to compete in a race. Programmed in OpenCV and simulated in Gazebo. Currently WIP.

item.title: Autonomous Cooking Robots
item.description: In summer of 2024 I collaborated with three other students to build a pair of fully automatic robots that served food on a custom designed course.
